transcript:
Customer: Hello?

Executive: Hello.

Executive: Hello.

Executive: Ha Rishabh ji.

Customer: Ha ji sir, kaise hain aap?

Executive: Badhiya hai is concern ko final karo.

Customer: Concern mein kuch hai hi nahi sir wo to buyer ne single star de diya ab kya bol raha hai buyer aapko?

Executive: Buyer keh raha hai main 20 jagah aur review karunga isi tarike se.

Customer: Usse kya hoga?

Executive: Alag alag usse hoga ki aapka business kharab hoga.

Customer: Nahi kuch nahi hoga usse aise kaise review kar dega agar aap se man lo buyer ka ek number aap se juda hua hai thik hai?

Executive: Are wo 20 number 20 20 number kar le dosto ke sath baith jaye.

Executive: Thik hai aise logo ka bharosa thodi na hai ki jo namune wo apne ko gali de raha hai.

Executive: Thik hai.

Executive: Hmm wo sab concern bhi genuine hai to samjhe bhi sahi concern kuch hai hi nahi mere khayal se ha concern kuch nahi phone nahi uthaya to kyu nahi uthaya?

Executive: Ye kya baat hui?

Executive: Ab itna to issue hui thi agar samne hota to batata usko ki 4 baje kyu phone nahi uthaya.

Executive: Hmm.

Executive: Matlab koi juda hua buyer thodi na hai humse saman thodi na le liya pehli baar.

Executive: Koi saman ha ha pehli baar connect kiya wo ki 7 baje kyu nahi uthaya isliye aur phone bhi nahi us pe nahi jata hai.

Executive: Ha ha.

Executive: Usme working hours likhe hue hai apne us pe.

Executive: Ha working hours likhe nahi ho to bhi yaar ek life ki ek style hai.

Executive: Kuch cheeze thodi na likhte hai har cheez likhna ki train mein chadhna kaise wo thodi na sikhata hai aadmi.

Executive: Kal ko is tarike ki bewakoofi bhare galiya galoch nahi hai wo 20 jagah aur review karunga dekh lena tu ne.

Executive: Faltu ka ha mera kismat achi hai ki tum jutte khane ke layak nahi ho mere samne.

Executive: Ye matlab aap se ye jo baatein kar raha hai ye ke 10 jagah aur review dunga ye kahan se whatsapp pe bol raha hai apne ko ya call pe bol raha hai?

Customer: Nahi nahi phone kiya tha isko subah.

Executive: Ki aapka ye call aaya tha us waqt hum attend nahi kar sakte the kyuki morning hours hote hai aur ha.

Executive: Hum office aate hai sabko call back bhi karte hai agar kisi ka miss ho jata hai to.

Customer: Ki nahi nahi aise kaise tumhara kaam hai uthane ka mujhe thodi pata 6 baje ya 7 baje.

Executive: Thik hai are maine kaha aise nahi hota bhaiya bal bache wale aadmi hai family wale log hai.

Executive: Fir bhi bole ja raha hai.

Executive: Ki main aur jagah dikha location bhi dekha tha maine kahan ka buyer hai kya hi expect karoge.

Customer: Ye Bihar ka hai Motihari ka.

Executive: Ha wahi main keh raha hu na.

Executive: To iska matlab apan ye kar sakte hai isse meri team se baat kari hai wo jo dekhte hai wo ye keh rahe hai ki agar buyer aisa kuch threaten apne ko kar raha hai to ya to usne return mein apne ko communication whatsapp pe kara hoga ya fir call ki apne paas par recording hogi hai na to ab ye aage apne ko dikkat to de sakta hai thik hai to apan aisa kar sakte hai ki ek bar matlab isse ya to apan whatsapp pe baat kare.

Executive: Apni taraf se keh rahe hai aapko kya dikkat hai aap mat dijiye review and all kuch deal apna hua nahi hai.

Customer: Dekho we are businessman samjho.

Customer: Hamara kaam ye nahi hai ki hum is tarah ke concern mein involve hote hai thik hai hum ek genuine concern aapko bhejte hai company ko thik hai.

Customer: To company walo ko kyuki ye aadmi kitne time se aap se juda hua hai kitne time se mere se juda hai usse fark padta hai thik hai aur aap mere sath kitne time se jude hue ho aur aap meri taraf kya dekhte ho thik hai pehla aisa concern hai jo apan teen char saal mein discuss kar rahe honge ye wala ha thik hai agar regular hota to samajh nahi aata ki ha bhai mera mera kaam hi yahi hai yaar bother karna kisi ko.

Customer: Mera kaam ye to hai nahi thik hai.

Customer: Agar aise case mein agar aapke paas is tarike ki matlab khud aapka hum aapke stakeholders bhi hai ye bata deta hu.

Customer: Company ka customer uska stakeholder bhi hota hai thik hai nahi sahi baat hai hum subscription paise dete hai isiliye dete hai ki hamara aap hame details dete ho hum us pe kaam karte hai thik hai business generate karte hai thik hai.

Customer: Is beech mein is tarah ki cheez hoti to but obvious hai service provider hote hue aapko hamare favor mein kaam karna padega nahi aap hi ke favor mein kaam kar rahe hai.

Executive: Hmm to bas yaha pe thoda sa ek main atakta hu yaha pe ya to main apne level pe koi buyer se engage ho jau.

Executive: Ha ha engage ho jao ha wahi karna padega isko samjha dunga main apne level pe samjha dunga.

Executive: Ki bhai na de but agar fir review deta hai ye man lo baad mein aur aate hai iske to fir apne aap se solution hoga ki apan iske dikha kar ke ha ye ek hi buyer ka review unnecessary de raha hai hatao team ko bolenge abhi number se dalega kon kon track karega is cheez ko.

Customer: Are karenge na check kya dikkat hai.

Executive: To aise matlab randomly dal bhi nahi payega ye apne ko itna.

Customer: Ha wo to nahi dal payega par maine isiliye raise kiya ki kabhi future mein aisa kuch aaye to dhyan rakhna.

Executive: Thik hai ha wahi main wahi karunga ki ek bar main apne level pe connect kar leta hu samjha deta hu man jaye to thik hai nahi mane to fir intezar karenge waise aapke level pe agar koi connect kar paye second voice mein isko samjhane ke liye.

Customer: Wo to kal karwaunga main ruko kal karwaunga isko main apne level pe kar leta hu main sab whatsapp record karwa lenge thik hai ha record kya whatsapp pe provok karna hai apne ko isko ki ha bhai keh rahe hai sir aap kya baat kar rahe the wo ke review kyu daloge aap hamari koi deal to hui nahi fir bolega ye waha pe whatsapp pe keh rahe hai main to dalunga kya karna hai aapko bas itna apne ko case karna hai.

Customer: karwa dunga ye kaam bhi aapka thik hai ha iske liye time nahi hai are nahi main kya keh raha hu aage ke review ki baat aap kar rahe ho agar aisi case mil to ye jo review iska aaya ye bhi apan hatwa denge wo hai mere paas solution thik hai ye bhi iska hata denge thik hai sir bolta hu ok.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer received a single-star review from a buyer.

- Buyer threatened to post negative reviews elsewhere.

- Customer concerned about potential business impact.

- Executive questions why the buyer didn't answer the call.



Resolution:

- Executive will connect with the buyer.

- Executive will try to resolve the issue.

- Executive will record WhatsApp conversation with buyer.

- Executive assured to remove the review.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- review, buyer, concern, whatsapp, business
